question: My last round of thyroid bloodwork showed that I was hypoglycemic. I had eaten 2 hours prior to giving the blood and my glucose was very low.  Now, I've been having so many other issues and when I look up the symptoms they all point to diabetes. Can you have diabetes and hypoglocemia at the same time?  And could this all be related to the thyroid cancer?
title: Thyroid issues connected with diabetes?
